Title: Gajaar: Journey of the Soul
Actors: Sanjiv Chopra, Umesh Jagtap, Chinmay Mandlekar, Suhas Sirsat
Plot: GAJAAR is a unique cinematic experience and the story of self-discovery and transformation of Parth during his 18 days Journey of pilgrimage (Waari). Warkaris nonstop chanting and musical ...
